body_html:
Using model_dir in the constructor still gives me the same error

reg=learn.DNNRegressor(hidden_units=[100,100],activation_fn=tf.tanh,model_dir='/DNN/')
reg.fit(X_train,Y_train,steps=100,monitors=[val_monitor],logdir='/DNN/')

> TypeError: fit() got an unexpected keyword argument 'logdir'

any help is welcome.

By the way I'm running tensorflow for Ubuntu/Linux 64-bit, GPU enabled, Python 2.7
Found here: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.9.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

Thanks!

body:
Using model_dir in the constructor still gives me the same error

```
reg=learn.DNNRegressor(hidden_units=[100,100],activation_fn=tf.tanh,model_dir='/DNN/')
reg.fit(X_train,Y_train,steps=100,monitors=[val_monitor],logdir='/DNN/')

> TypeError: fit() got an unexpected keyword argument 'logdir'
```

any help is welcome.

By the way I'm running tensorflow for Ubuntu/Linux 64-bit, GPU enabled, Python 2.7 
Found here: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.9.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

Thanks!
